fixes.name: Netted
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR sumConditional = SUMX(
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR] = "R",
        - 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD (excl Int/FWD)],
        IF(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR] = "RR",
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD (excl Int/FWD)],
            0
        )
    )
)
VAR nettingSum = SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[fixed netting])
RETURN
sumConditional - nettingSum
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau SUM(IF ... END) into a SUMX over the table to evaluate the row-level IF per row, returning -Initial Cash for R, Initial Cash for RR, else 0, then subtracted the SUM of fixed netting. Kept all column references in 'Table'[Column] format and implemented as a measure because the calculation uses aggregation functions (SUM).
